sense.name: class
sense.examples: He took driving lessons. My dance lesson lasts an hour. Mary's violin lesson was cancelled because of the snow.

sense.name: task
sense.commentary: a task assigned for individual study
sense.examples: He did the lesson for today. You should be able to do today's lesson in just a few minutes. He crumpled up his spelling lesson and put it in his pocket.

sense.name: deterrent example
sense.commentary: example, object lesson - punishment intended as a warning to others
sense.examples: They decided to make a lesson of him.

sense.name: moral
sense.commentary: the significance of a story or event
sense.examples: The lesson of the story is to love thy neighbor. You will usually find a lesson for the reader in her stories.
